statements: SELECT user_id, behavior_type, transaction_date, transaction_amount, wallet_id, prediction_result FROM user_behavior_patterns
SELECT * FROM user_behavior_patterns WHERE behavior_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT user_id, behavior_type, transaction_amount FROM user_behavior_patterns WHERE transaction_amount > 1000
SELECT user_id, behavior_type, wallet_id FROM user_behavior_patterns WHERE prediction_result LIKE '%success%'
SELECT user_id, behavior_type, prediction_result FROM user_behavior_patterns WHERE wallet_id IS NOT NULL
SELECT user_id, behavior_type, transaction_amount FROM user_behavior_patterns ORDER BY user_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM user_behavior_patterns WHERE behavior_type='purchase' AND prediction_result='valid' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, wallet_id, prediction_result FROM user_behavior_patterns WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY wallet_id, prediction_result;
SELECT user_id, behavior_type, transaction_date, wallet_id FROM user_behavior_patterns WHERE prediction_result='fraudulent' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT behavior_type FROM user_behavior_patterns WHERE prediction_result='valid';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email, registration_date FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username, transaction_date, amount FROM users JOIN transactions ON users.user_id = transactions.user_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING transaction_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email, registration_date FROM users WHERE registration_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT user_id, transaction_date, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users JOIN transactions ON users.user_id = transactions.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY registration_date DESC;

SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT user_id, email, registration_date FROM users WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, balance, last_updated FROM wallet_balance WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM wallet_balance WHERE balance < 0;
SELECT username, registration_date FROM users ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT transactions.transaction_id, users.username, transactions.amount FROM transactions JOIN users ON transactions.user_id = users.user_id ORDER BY transactions.amount ASC;
SELECT user_id, transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM user_wallet_data ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, behavior_timestamp, behavior_type, behavior_description FROM user_behavior_patterns WHERE behavior_type = 'login';
SELECT user_id, MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM user_wallet_data;
SELECT user_id, transaction_id, transaction_type, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transaction_trends WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, insight_id, insight_description, insight_date FROM user_insights ORDER BY insight_date ASC;

SELECT * FROM user_behavior_patterns WHERE behavior_type = 'login' ORDER BY behavior_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, transaction_type, transaction_amount FROM transaction_trends WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_category FROM transaction_trends WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, insight_description FROM user_insights WHERE insight_date >= '2022-01-01' AND insight_date <= '2022-06-30';

SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM wallets WHERE balance > 1000.00 ORDER BY balance DESC;
